headline.print_headline: Educator Recounts ‘Painful Experience’ of Halloween Email Furor at Yale
headline.main: Yale Educator Recounts ‘Painful Experience’ of Halloween Email Furor

snippet: Erika Christakis, a former lecturer at Yale, spoke for the first time in an interview about her experience as an unwitting target over campus protests against racial insensitivity.
abstract: Former Yale University lecturer Erika Christakis is beginning to recuperate from firestorm she endured after encouraging students to have open dialogue about racially charged Halloween incident at school; Christakis, who may or may not return to lecturing, feels her words were taken out of context; mood at Yale and at other campuses across country is shifting, with administrators pushing back against student demands for cultural sensitivity.
